name: St. Nimatullah Kassab

locations.description: Maronite monk and hermit in Lebanon, known for his holiness and miracles

summary: Nimatullah Kassab was a Maronite Catholic monk and hermit from Lebanon who lived a life of prayer, penance, and service to the poor. He entered the Lebanese Maronite Order and later became a hermit, dedicating himself to contemplation and helping those in need. He is known for his humility, charity, and numerous miracles attributed to his intercession. He is venerated as a saint in the Maronite Church.
